entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 2400 metres near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
